lead_paragraph: The Canadian lawyer who accused Russia of operating a state-run doping program is facing "a deluge of requests" for information on individual athletes implicated in his investigation.

headline.print_headline: Doping Investigator Faces 'Deluge of Requests' on Russians
headline.main: Doping Investigator Faces 'Deluge of Requests' on Russians

snippet: The Canadian lawyer who accused Russia of operating a state-run doping program is facing "a deluge of requests" for information on individual athletes implicated in his investigation....
